# rule

# 简介

利用这个JSON规则来生成对应布局和相关层级结构，同时可针对style设置className设置

# ts中使用

import type { RuleType } from "vue-beast-form";

const rule = ref<RuleType[]>([
  {
    // 引入type方便书写
  }
])

# 字段介绍

名称基础类型或者TS自定义类型说明
typeString 必填用于生成对应组件的名称
propsObject组件的props
fieldString在api中用来做搜索的key,表单组件时用来记录值得key
titleString | RuleType | false为formItem的label值
string：直接展示
rule：渲染成插槽展示
false：不包裹在form-item
modelString | Array<String>组件v-model:key 对应的key 监听多个v-model时可为数组
defaultValueString | Array<String>组件v-model:key="value" 对应的value的默认空值,有些组件默认空值需要配置为[]的情况可进行配置使用
valueany组件值
validateArray组件验证规则,例如：[{required: true, message: '请输入内容'}]
classString | Array针对组件设置className
styleString | Object针对组件设置style
attrsObject针对组件设置attr
childrenArray<String|RuleType> | { [slot: string]:Function }子集渲染，使用注意事项在下方示例中
slotString渲染在指定插槽下
displayBoolean是否显示
directivesArray<Directives>指令配置
onObject组件事件监听，on事件监听的事件会默认在最后一个参数绑定一个api对象方便使用api
emitsArray<EmitType>会抛出事件到最顶层

# type示例

div
span
<template>
  <beast-form :rule="rule" />
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from "vue";
import vbf from "vue-beast-form";

// 如果$beastForm.base有配置且不需要切换$beastForm.frameworks无需使用这条
vbf.useFramework("ant-design-vue");

export default {
  components: { BeastForm: vbf.beastForm() },
  setup() {
    const rule = ref([
      {
        title: "组件",
        type: "a-input",
        props: {
          placeholder: "请输入",
        },
      },
      {
        type: "div",
        children: ["div"],
      },
      {
        type: "span",
        children: ["span"],
      },
    ]);
    return {
      rule,
    };
  },
};
</script>
显示代码复制代码复制代码

# props示例

<template>
  <beast-form :rule="rule" />
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from "vue";
import vbf from "vue-beast-form";

// 如果$beastForm.base有配置且不需要切换$beastForm.frameworks无需使用这条
vbf.useFramework("ant-design-vue");

export default {
  components: { BeastForm: vbf.beastForm() },
  setup() {
    const rule = ref([
      {
        title: "限制：最小0，最大50，步长50",
        type: "a-input-number",
        field: "num",
        props: {
          min: 0,
          max: 50,
          step: 10,
          placeholder: "请输入",
        },
      },
    ]);
    return {
      rule,
    };
  },
};
</script>
显示代码复制代码复制代码

# field示例

表单值：

<template>
  <div>表单值：{{ value }}</div>
  <br />
  <beast-form :rule="rule" v-model="value" />
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from "vue";
import vbf from "vue-beast-form";

// 如果$beastForm.base有配置且不需要切换$beastForm.frameworks无需使用这条
vbf.useFramework("ant-design-vue");

export default {
  components: { BeastForm: vbf.beastForm() },
  setup() {
    const rule = ref([
        {
          title: "名称",
          type: "a-input",
          field: "name",
          props: {
            placeholder: "请输入",
          },
          children: [],
        },
        {
          type: "a-space",
          children: [
            {
              type: "a-button",
              props: {
                type: "primary",
              },
              children: ["保存"],
              on: {
                click: (e, api) => {
                  alert(JSON.stringify(api.getFormData()));
                },
              },
            },
            {
              type: "a-button",
              children: ["取消"],
              on: {
                click: (e, api) => {
                  api.resetFormData();
                },
              },
            },
          ],
        },
      ]),
      value = ref();
    return {
      rule,
      value,
    };
  },
};
</script>
显示代码复制代码复制代码

# title示例

<template>
  <beast-form :rule="rule" />
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from "vue";
import vbf from "vue-beast-form";

// 如果$beastForm.base有配置且不需要切换$beastForm.frameworks无需使用这条
vbf.useFramework("ant-design-vue");

export default {
  components: { BeastForm: vbf.beastForm() },
  setup() {
    const rule = ref([
      {
        title: "有title",
        type: "a-input",
        field: "inp1",
        props: {
          placeholder: "正常title",
        },
      },
      {
        title: {
          type: "a-badge",
          props: {
            count: 1,
          },
          children: ["对象title"],
        },
        type: "a-input",
        field: "inp2",
        props: {
          placeholder: "对象title",
        },
      },
      {
        title: false,
        type: "a-input",
        field: "inp3",
        props: {
          placeholder: "无title",
        },
      },
    ]);
    return {
      rule,
    };
  },
};
</script>
显示代码复制代码复制代码

# value示例

<template>
  <beast-form :rule="rule" />
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from "vue";
import vbf from "vue-beast-form";

// 如果$beastForm.base有配置且不需要切换$beastForm.frameworks无需使用这条
vbf.useFramework("ant-design-vue");

export default {
  components: { BeastForm: vbf.beastForm() },
  setup() {
    const rule = ref([
      {
        title: "值20",
        type: "a-input-number",
        field: "num",
        props: {
          placeholder: "请输入",
        },
        value: 20,
      },
    ]);
    return {
      rule,
    };
  },
};
</script>
显示代码复制代码复制代码

# vModel示例

model和defaultValue

value:

  • menuItem1
  • sub1
    • sub1-menu2
    • sub1-menu3
  • sub2
    • sub2-menu4
    • sub2-menu5
<template>
  <div>value: {{ value }}</div>
  <br />
  <beast-form :rule="rule" v-model="value" />
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from "vue";
import vbf from "vue-beast-form";

// 如果$beastForm.base有配置且不需要切换$beastForm.frameworks无需使用这条
vbf.useFramework("ant-design-vue");

export default {
  components: { BeastForm: vbf.beastForm() },
  setup() {
    const rule = ref([
        {
          type: "a-menu",
          title: "菜单组件",
          field: "menu",
          props: {
            theme: "dark",
            mode: "inline",
          },
          children: [
            { type: "a-menu-item", props: { key: "item1" }, children: ["menuItem1"] },
            {
              type: "a-sub-menu",
              props: { key: "sub1", title: "sub1" },
              children: [
                {
                  type: "a-menu-item",
                  props: { key: "item2" },
                  children: ["sub1-menu2"],
                },
                {
                  type: "a-menu-item",
                  props: { key: "item3" },
                  children: ["sub1-menu3"],
                },
              ],
            },
            {
              type: "a-sub-menu",
              props: { key: "sub2", title: "sub2" },
              children: [
                {
                  type: "a-menu-item",
                  props: { key: "item4" },
                  children: ["sub2-menu4"],
                },
                {
                  type: "a-menu-item",
                  props: { key: "item5" },
                  children: ["sub2-menu5"],
                },
              ],
            },
          ],
          model: ["openKeys", "selectedKeys"],
          defaultValue: [[], []],
        },
      ]),
      value = ref();
    return {
      rule,
      value,
    };
  },
};
</script>
显示代码复制代码复制代码

# validate示例

表单值：

<template>
  <div>表单值：{{ value }}</div>
  <br />
  <beast-form :rule="rule" v-model="value" />
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from "vue";
import vbf from "vue-beast-form";

// 如果$beastForm.base有配置且不需要切换$beastForm.frameworks无需使用这条
vbf.useFramework("ant-design-vue");

export default {
  components: { BeastForm: vbf.beastForm() },
  setup() {
    const rule = ref([
        {
          title: "名称",
          type: "a-input",
          field: "name",
          props: {
            placeholder: "请输入",
          },
          validate: [{ required: true, message: "必须填写" }],
        },
        {
          title: "大于10",
          type: "a-input-number",
          field: "num",
          props: {
            placeholder: "请输入",
          },
          validate: [
            { required: true, message: "必须填写" },
            { type: "number", min: 10, message: "必须大于10" },
          ],
        },
        {
          title: "和上头一致",
          type: "a-input-number",
          field: "num-top",
          props: {
            placeholder: "请输入",
          },
          validate: [
            { required: true, message: "必须填写" },
            {
              validator: (_r, v) => {
                if (value.value.num === v) {
                  return Promise.resolve();
                } else {
                  return Promise.reject("与上头数字不一致");
                }
              },
            },
          ],
        },
        {
          type: "a-space",
          children: [
            {
              type: "a-button",
              props: {
                type: "primary",
              },
              children: ["保存"],
              on: {
                click: (e, api) => {
                  api.validate((valid, data) => {});
                },
              },
            },
            {
              type: "a-button",
              children: ["取消"],
              on: {
                click: (e, api) => {
                  api.resetFormData();
                },
              },
            },
          ],
        },
      ]),
      value = ref();
    return {
      rule,
      value,
    };
  },
};
</script>
显示代码复制代码复制代码

# sca示例

style、class、attrs 示例

注意有formItem层级时候 外层对应的是formItem props对应的是设置组件

div string add class
div string[] add class
div string add style
div object add style
div add attrs
<template>
  <beast-form :rule="rule" />
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from "vue";
import vbf from "vue-beast-form";

// 如果$beastForm.base有配置且不需要切换$beastForm.frameworks无需使用这条
vbf.useFramework("ant-design-vue");

export default {
  components: { BeastForm: vbf.beastForm() },
  setup() {
    const rule = ref([
      {
        type: "div",
        class: "add-class",
        children: ["div string add class"],
      },
      {
        type: "div",
        class: ["add-class1", "add-class2"],
        children: ["div string[] add class"],
      },
      {
        type: "div",
        style: "background:green",
        children: ["div string add style"],
      },
      {
        type: "div",
        style: { border: "red 1px solid" },
        children: ["div object add style"],
      },
      {
        type: "div",
        attrs: {
          a: 1,
        },
        children: ["div add attrs"],
      },
      {
        type: "a-input",
        title: "输入框组件设置formItem层",
        field: "t1",
        style: { border: "red 1px solid" },
        class: ["itemClass"],
        attrs: { itemAttr: 1 },
      },
      {
        type: "a-input",
        title: "输入框组件设置Input",
        field: "t2",
        props: {
          style: { border: "red 1px solid" },
          class: ["inputClass"],
          inputAttr: 1,
        },
      },
    ]);
    return {
      rule,
    };
  },
};
</script>
显示代码复制代码复制代码

# children示例

使用对象函数方式渲染： 1.必须返回一个数组 2.无法进行内容的filed的搜索 3.如无特殊需要请直接使用数组方式渲染

数组渲染：
col1-12
col2-12

对象函数渲染：
name1
name2
name3
name4
<template>
  <beast-form :rule="rule" />
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from "vue";
import vbf from "vue-beast-form";
import draggable from "vuedraggable";

// 如果$beastForm.base有配置且不需要切换$beastForm.frameworks无需使用这条
vbf.useFramework("ant-design-vue");
vbf.components({ draggable });

export default {
  components: { BeastForm: vbf.beastForm() },
  setup() {
    const rule = ref([
      { type: "div", children: ["数组渲染："] },
      {
        type: "a-row",
        children: [
          { type: "a-col", props: { span: 12 }, children: ["col1-12"] },
          { type: "a-col", props: { span: 12 }, children: ["col2-12"] },
        ],
      },
      { type: "br" },
      { type: "div", children: ["对象函数渲染："] },
      {
        type: "draggable",
        props: {
          itemKey: "id",
          list: [
            { id: 1, name: "name1" },
            { id: 2, name: "name2" },
            { id: 3, name: "name3" },
            { id: 4, name: "name4" },
          ],
        },
        children: {
          item: ({ element }) => {
            return [
              {
                type: "div",
                children: [element.name],
              },
            ];
          },
        },
      },
    ]);
    return {
      rule,
    };
  },
};
</script>
显示代码复制代码复制代码

# slot示例

前缀后缀
<template>
  <beast-form :rule="rule" />
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from "vue";
import vbf from "vue-beast-form";

// 如果$beastForm.base有配置且不需要切换$beastForm.frameworks无需使用这条
vbf.useFramework("ant-design-vue");

export default {
  components: { BeastForm: vbf.beastForm() },
  setup() {
    const rule = ref([
      {
        title: "组件",
        type: "a-input",
        props: {
          placeholder: "请输入",
        },
        children: [
          { type: "span", slot: "prefix", children: ["前缀"] },
          { type: "span", slot: "suffix", children: ["后缀"] },
        ],
      },
    ]);
    return {
      rule,
    };
  },
};
</script>
显示代码复制代码复制代码

# display示例

<template>
  <beast-form :rule="rule" />
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from "vue";
import vbf from "vue-beast-form";

// 如果$beastForm.base有配置且不需要切换$beastForm.frameworks无需使用这条
vbf.useFramework("ant-design-vue");

export default {
  components: { BeastForm: vbf.beastForm() },
  setup() {
    const rule = ref([
      {
        type: "a-input",
        title: "组件",
        props: {
          placeholder: "请输入",
        },
        display: false,
      },
      {
        type: "div",
        children: ["div"],
        display: false,
      },
    ]);
    return {
      rule,
    };
  },
};
</script>
显示代码复制代码复制代码

# 事件处理示例

div on click
div directives 控制台查看打印
div emits click 控制台查看打印
<template>
  <beast-form :rule="rule" @divClick="onDivClick" />
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent, ref } from "vue";
import vbf from "vue-beast-form";

// 有emits配置需要这句话避免警告
vbf.emits("divClick");

// 如果$beastForm.base有配置且不需要切换$beastForm.frameworks无需使用这条
vbf.useFramework("ant-design-vue");

// 指令
vbf.directive("test2", {
  mounted() {
    console.log("指令打印", "directive:test2");
  },
});

export default defineComponent({
  components: { BeastForm: vbf.beastForm() },
  setup() {
    const rule = ref([
      {
        type: "div",
        children: ["div on click"],
        on: {
          click: (e, api) => {
            alert("点击了");
          },
        },
      },
      {
        type: "div",
        children: ["div directives 控制台查看打印"],
        directives: [["test2"]],
      },
      {
        type: "div",
        children: ["div emits click 控制台查看打印"],
        emits: [
          {
            alias: "divClick",
            event: "click",
          },
        ],
      },
    ]);

    const onDivClick = (e, api) => {
      console.log("emits click:", e, api);
    };

    return {
      rule,
      onDivClick,
    };
  },
});
</script>
显示代码复制代码复制代码
